body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
I'd like to update search attributes for existing schedules the same way you can do so for workflows.

**Describe the solution you'd like**
I'd like to update search attributes for existing schedules the same way you can do so for workflows.

**Describe alternatives you've considered**
You can delete all schedules and re-create them, but this is a high-risk operation in production that we would like to avoid.

**Additional context**
Link to slack thread: https://temporalio.slack.com/archives/CTRCR8RBP/p1694460216326639
title: Ability to update search attributes for schedules
